attributes.action: Change the law regarding uploads of mobile phones to websites such as YouTube and Google.  Force companies to actively police their websites and impose very severe penalties for failure to act.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Children as young as 11 and 12 are being beaten unconscious, with others filming the fight and then it being uploaded onto websites for the world to see.  This is incredibly humiliating and angering to the person involved.  Companies such as Google have said that it is not their job to check their own site for these brutal videos.  They claim that that is the responsibility of the Police.  It needs to be made a criminal offence to record fights using recording equipment and very serious penalties need to be imposed on those involved, even underage persons.
